name: Bip + Bop
description:
Bip and Bop's worlds are converging - and it looks pretty scary! Help Bip and Bop return their worlds to order by alternating between them and compounding their unique abilities!

Get the soundtrack for free here!

Ways this game follows the 2021 GMTK Game Jam theme "Joined Together":

 - The player can alternate between two characters at any time, using their abilities in tandem with each other like a puzzle to optimize movement, damage, etc.

 - The boss at the end of the level also has the ability to switch between two forms with different abilities.

 - The number of enemies left in the level directly impacts the boss fight at the end (but we will not spoil how)!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump/select

X to switch characters

Down + space to attack

Important Tips:

 - Bop the Bear can cling to walls!

 - Bop the Bear has a shorter jump than Bip the Rabbit.

 - Switching characters stores their action and momentum! Check the top right of the screen to see how the character will behave when swapped back into play, and use it to your advantage to perform actions one character can't do alone.
